law.catch_line: Payment on execution after return day -- Effect.
law.text: Any payment made to a sheriff or other officer, or his deputy, on an execution after the return day and while the execution remains in his hands shall be a satisfaction to that extent. The officer and his sureties on his official bond shall be responsible therefor, in the same manner as if the payment were made before the return day.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4585.
